data.title: Scenic Uttaranchal
data.qoute: ...Explore Nainital and Ranikhet and Jim Corbett National Park and Haridwar and Mussoorie

overview.title: Nainital (…Peachy and Decency, Sign A Peace Treaty):
overview.subtitle: Beautiful mountain, crystal-clear lakes, famous temples and greenery all over is Nainital for you. Popularly known as the City of Lakes, Nainital is an idyllic escape from the humdrum of city life. Enveloped in a thick foil of nature, accentuated by the scent of the flowering blossoms blending miraculously in the crisp fresh air, Nainital is truly the treasure trove of Kumano. It is among the most visited hill station of the North India since British period.

overview.title: Ranikhet (…The Queen’s Meadow):
overview.subtitle: Settled amidst the fresh breeze, the charming view of the lush green forests and the majestic Himalayas, the adventure wildlife and the melodious chirping of birds will leave nature’s admirers awestruck in Ranikhet. Located in the Himalayan land of Uttarakhand, Ranikhet is the best of hill stations.

overview.title: Jim Corbett National Park (…Hear Nature’s Roar):
overview.subtitle: Jim Corbett National Park can be befittingly called the paradise of Tigers for the fact that it holds a large population of Tigers in its breathtaking landscaped that consists of different varieties of flora and fauna. Named after the legendary tiger hunter turned naturalist Jim Corbett, the proud destinations ‘Jim Corbett National Park’ was the first national park of India, which was established in 1936 in the Uttarakhand.

overview.title: Haridwar (…Gateway to Heaven):
overview.subtitle: Haridwar is one of the seven sacred cities of the Hindus and is a major pilgrimage center. It has been known by many names originally it was called Kapila’ for the sage who once lived there. Its present name means 'Door to Hari' Hari is one of the names of Lord Vishnu’ a principal deity of Hindusim.

overview.title: Mussoorie (…Truly a Queen):
overview.subtitle: Mussoorie, the proverbial queen of Hill station, as professed by the British gentry who evaded hot, desultory summers of Delhi and Kolkata by Spending time here. Being at an average altitude of 2,000 meters Mussoorie, with its green hills and varied flora and fauna, is a fascinating hill resort. Commanding snow ranges to the north- east, and glittering views of the Doon Valley and Shivalik ranges in the south, the town was once said to present a ‘fairyland’ atmosphere to tourists.

data.route: Delhi – Nainital - Ranikhet - Jim Corbett National Park - Haridwar - Mussoorie - Delhi
data.nightStay: Nainital (3 Nights), Ranikhet (1 Night), Corbett (2 Nights), Haridwar (1 Night), Mussoorie (2 Nights)

description.title: Day 1 Pickup from Delhi Railway Station/Airport (325 Kms : 8Hrs. Travelling to Nainital)

subtitles.activities: Arrival in Nainital and enjoy a quick and hassle-free check-in at Hotel.
Evening free to enjoy the boating at Naini Lake (At your own) & you can visit Mall Road for shopping.
Lake Tour Bhimtal, Naukuchia Tal, Sat Tal, Hanuman Temple, Golu Devta Temple at Gorhakhal.
Evening Nainital Sightseeing such as Nainia Devi Temple, Naini Lake, Tibetan Market.
Sightseeing such as Nainia Devi Temple, Naina Peak, Kilbury, Raj Bhawan, St. John’s Church, Land’s End, Zoo Gardens, Snow View Point, Cave Garden, Tiffin Top as per your time & comfort.

description.title: Day 4  Nanintal to  Ranikhet (65 Kms : 2Hrs. Travelling to Ranikhet)

subtitles.activities: Sightseeing of Ranikhet like Golf Ground, Maa Kali Temple, Kumaon Regement Army Head Quarter and evening visit to Mall Road.

description.title: Day 5  Ranikhet to Corbett National Park (95 Kms : 3-4Hrs. Travelling to Corbett Park)

subtitles.activities: visit Corbett Museum and Garzia Devi Temple.
Full day free to Explore Corbett National Park.

description.title: Day 7  Corbett to Haridwar  (210 Kms : 4-5Hrs. Travelling to Haridwar)

subtitles.activities: Evening Arti at Har-Ki-Pauri. Visit local market Moti Bazar and Temples like Bhuma Niketan Mandir, Bharat Mata Mandir, Vaishno Devi Mandir and Pawan Dham.

description.title: Day 8  Haridwar to Mussoorie (80 Kms : 2-3Hrs. Travelling to Mussoorie)

subtitles.activities: Start Journey to Mussoorie by covering the Sightseeing of Dehradun include, Sai Baba Mandir, Prakasheshwar Mahadev Mandir and Malsi Deer Park.

visit Kampty Fall (15 kms from Mussoorie on the Yamunotri Road is the most fascinating and the biggest water fall, Kempty Fall is located in a beautiful valley of Mussoorie.) Company Garden, Mall Road, Rope Way (One can enjoy a thrilling ropeway ride to Gun Hill, the second highest peak of Mussoorie - 2122 mts; the peak offers a panoramic view of the Himalayan ranges.)

description.title: Day 10 Check Out from Mussoorie (265 Kms : 7Hrs. Travelling to Delhi)

subtitles.activities: Reaching at Airport by having Sweet Memoires in mind and lots of love.

importantInfo.title: Note
subtitles: Vehicles are not allowed on the Mall road of Nainital and Mussoorie so you have to travel by foot there.
AC and Music System in Vehicle will not be operated when we are on the Hilly Area.
All the rates are subject to change without prior notice.
All disputes are subject to Haridwar Jurisdiction.
Govt. Taxes (GST)

subtitles: Kindly release 25% Payment for the Blocking.

subtitles: 10% of the Total Package Cost is Non-Refundable.
25% cancellation charge of the total package cost, if cancellation less than 30 days before arrival.
35% cancellation charge of the total package cost, if cancellation between 15 to 7 days before arrival.
50% cancellation charge of the total package cost if cancellation between 7 to 2 days before arrival.
100% cancellation charge of the total package cost if cancellation before 48 Hrs. before arrival.
Altering the confirmed plan Not possible.

inclusionAndExclusion.title: Experience Includes:
subtitles: Accommodation at all the places mention in the itinerary.
Meal Plan: MAPAI (Bed with Breakfast and Dinner) based on fixed meals, served in the restaurant.
Transportation around the tour (As mentioned above).
All sightseeing and excursion as per the Itinerary.
All Toll Tax, Parking Includes.

inclusionAndExclusion.title: Tour Cost dose not Includes:
subtitles: Extra Meal, Boating Charges, Ropeway Charge, Entry Fee, Guide Fee etc.
Anything not specifically mentioned in “Experience Include”.
